channel.title: Comments on: More Delays
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: Well, it's a long way to China where the printer is. And they might know wu shu.
item.content:encoded: Well, it’s a long way to China where the printer is. And they might know wu shu.

item.title: By: monica
item.dc:creator: monica
item.description:
Am I going to have to go and kick some ass somewhere for you? Grrrr.....
I feel your pain acutely.
item.content:encoded:
Am I going to have to go and kick some ass somewhere for you? Grrrr…..

I feel your pain acutely.
